price: 23. Iš tiesų, tai Mes nuleidome tau (Muchammedai ﷺ) Koraną palaipsniui.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
